## Context
We provided data in the best format. Not always the case, because people collect data in a format that works best for them - not the computer. Focus on columns (variables); rows (observations) and how this is needed for plotting, linking with the last part of day 1.

## From wide to long
LO: reshape data from “wide” to “long” (practise this on two different, but linked data sets - leading into combining data)

## From long to wide
LO: reshape from long to wide
